**Day 2:**
Gathered resources: - A circle for the head (`r="100"`) - Two rectangles for the ears (`width="50", height="70"` each) - An ellipse for the body (`rx="300", ry="200"`) - A rectangle for the pouch (`width="150", height="120"`) - Two rectangles for the legs (`width="40", height="200"` each)
**Day 3:**
Collected colors from the local flora: - Brown: `#8B4513` - Grey: `#A9A9A9`

**Day 4:**
Completed the path marking and prepared to head back home.
